mapper.select:
select case wt."name" when 'SUB' then true else false end as sub, w."name" as work_name, wb.work_name as unit_name, sum(wo.second_convert) * 1.06 as current_value, (select sum(ws.second_convert) * 1.06 from work_book wk join work_operations ws on wk.id = ws.work_book_id where wk.id = ( select id from work_book where model_id= #{modelId} and stlst=#{stlst} and phase_id != #{phaseId} order by create_at desc limit 1)) as last_value, wb.id as work_book_id, c.id from work_book wb join work_operations wo on wb.id = wo.work_book_id join workstation w on wb.workstation_id = w.id join workstation_type wt on w.workstation_type_id = wt.id left join collection_compare_item c on wb.id = c.work_book_id where 1 = 1
and wb.id in
#{item}
group by wt."name", w."name", wb.work_name, wb.id, c.id
